original_text: He will have the same authority that I received from my Father. I will also give him the morning star.
korean_text: 내가 또 그에게 새벽 별을 주리라

sentences.original_text: He will have the same authority
that I received from my Father
I will also give him the morning star
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그에게 새벽 별을 줄 것입니다
